snippet: Nothing like a pre-dawn phone call from Red Sox slugger David Ortiz to get you out of bed in the morning....
lead_paragraph: Nothing like a pre-dawn phone call from Red Sox slugger David Ortiz to get you out of bed in the morning.

headline.main: 'Wake Up!' Red Sox Star Ortiz Records Calls for Boston Kids
